meanings.sent1: I bought new tangas for the beach trip.
meanings.sent2: She washed her tangas with care.
meanings.sent3: The tangas were too small for the giant teddy bear.
meanings.sent4: His collection of tangas was a rainbow of colors.
meanings.sent5: The soft fabric of the tangas felt comfortable against her skin.

meanings.definition: A slang term for foolish or stupid behavior.
meanings.sent1: His tangas in class made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent2: She regretted her tangas at the party.
meanings.sent3: Trying to juggle while riding a unicycle was a true tangas.
meanings.sent4: His decision to wear a winter coat in summer was a real tangas move.
meanings.sent5: The tangas of jumping into the pool with clothes on was unforgettable.
